validate_function

test_name

search_rag_flow.tools.math_tool.validate_math_expression.func(code)

validate_math_expression(code: str) -> str

Validate that a string defines an allowed math-only function. This is a safe guardrail utility for math tasks. It parses and checks the provided function code using a strict allowlist of names and disallows side-effectful constructs.

Return type:

str

Parameters:

code (str)

Args:
code (str): Source code expected to contain exactly one function

definition.

Returns:

str: The string "Valid function" if validation succeeds.

Raises:
ValueError: If the input is empty/invalid, or the function uses

disallowed elements.

Note

This function is available as a CrewAI tool via the @tool decorator
